PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-17922002-10-240,  ,  F&O,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the BRITISH COLUMBIA SPORT FISHING REGULATIONS, 1996 by, inter alia, changing the daily recreational shrimp quota from a weight limit to a number limit (200), requiring the name of the operator of a recreational crab, shrimp or octopus trap to be displayed on the buoys attached to the gear, allowing two traps to be marked with one buoy, specifying the method for measuring the length of lingcod, and by making a number of minor amendments to eliminate ambiguities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0380 Publication Date: 2002-11-06
Attachments
